evidence.claim: Obra Capital utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant, indicating they handle health data with appropriate security measures.
They mention HL7 standards for health data exchange.
Obra Capital employs Kafka for integrating real-time data streams.
The company indicates use of Google Cloud for data management solutions.
